summary: Build fails due to pre-existing type error in workbench-client.tsx

recommendation: This is a pre-existing issue not introduced by TKT-038. The TKT-038 implementation (DeletePoolModal and pools-client changes) is correct and meets all acceptance criteria. Fix the workbench-client.tsx type error, or use selective merge to cherry-pick only TKT-038 files.
